metadata.title: AI rivals like OpenAI, Nvidia, and Oracle are collaborating to build ‘Stargate’—but a Yale expert says it violates 135 years of antitrust law
metadata.description: Six AI leaders are uniting to form a single company. How is this possibly legal, asks Madhavi Singh of Yale’s Thurman Arnold Project, an initiative dedicated to antitrust issues.
metadata.keywords: President Trump, Project Stargate, Sam Altman, Larry Ellison, Madhavi Singh, Microsoft, Masayoshi Son, Nvidia, Microsoft, joint venture, OpenAI, Stargate Project
